title: Doctor Clairvoyant - Novel Updates
tags: Eye Powers   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: 大小写
description: One day after Lin Qi woke up, he found that he had inherited kind of ancient super power and owned miraculous X-ray vision. He was no longer an ordinary doctor. But meanwhile he’d also had a lot of troubles, because the bland Director asked him out to do some unspeakable things in the woods yesterday, and today he had already had a date with a hot teacher, a cute campus belle, a tall policewoman and a spoiled actress…See how he was gonna handle them and his life…>
